name: Psybeam
description: You send a beam of invisible, psychic energy at a target in range. The target must make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC, taking 2d6 + MOVE psychic damage on a fail, or half as much on a success. Creatures that fail the save by 5 or more become confused.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.

contest.effect: Makes the audience expect little of the other contestants.
